s: Summary: Consensus 2026 Opening Night Party across three venues on the 26th floor, featuring cocktails, live music, immersive NFT visuals and a headline DJ set.
Topics: Crypto culture, NFT art installations, experiential entertainment tech, brand activation, high‑net‑worth networking.
Speakers: Anil Ahuja (visual curator), DJ Mia, Dayah Modo (DJ), event hosts from Platinum and Piranha badge programs.
r: Showcase brand to a concentrated crypto‑savvy audience.
Forge high‑impact relationships with founders, investors and media partners.
Experience cutting‑edge immersive media that signals future event standards.
